component.text:
• 配置接口
  • interface type-and-number
  • description description-text
  • ip address ipv4-address subnet-mask
  • no shutdown

component.feedback: ***您必须输入确切完整的命令。包含名称或密码的命令区分大小写。***
component.existingcommands:
配置 GigabitEthernet 0/0 接口：
  • 将 IPv4 地址配置为 192.168.10.1，子网掩码配置为 255.255.255.0。
  • 将链路描述为“LAN-10”。
  • 激活接口。

command.deviceresponse: Enter configuration commands, one per line.End with CNTL/Z.

%LINK-5-CHANGED: Interface GigabitEthernet0/0, changed state to up
%LINEPROTO-5-UPDOWN: Line protocol on Interface GigabitEthernet0/0, changed state to up
command.instruction:
配置 GigabitEthernet 0/1 接口：
  • 将 IPv4 地址配置为 192.168.11.1，子网掩码配置为 255.255.255.0。
  • 将链路描述为“LAN-11”
  • 激活接口

command.deviceresponse:
%LINK-5-CHANGED: Interface GigabitEthernet0/1, changed state to up
%LINEPROTO-5-UPDOWN: Line protocol on Interface GigabitEthernet0/1, changed state to up
R1(config-if)#
command.instruction: <font size = '11' face="_sans"><b>您已成功配置 R1 LAN 接口。</font>
